item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjusting the Platter, Cleaning the Panels and Installing a 3D Printed Guiding Washer for the Cabinet
item.description:
I dedicated some time today to refining the appearance of the Beogram 4000 I’m currently working on. The first step involved adjusting the platter’s height and alignment within the aluminum panel. Achieving a centered and flush platter is crucial for the Beogram’s visual appeal. The platter was positioned too low upon arrival, even grazing the panel due to misalignment. Therefore, I made adjustments to the main bearing and the chassis’s three suspension points to achieve the correct setup...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-adjusting-the-platter-cleaning-the-panels-and-installing-a-3d-printed-guiding-washer-for-the-cabinet/

item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513): Another New Arrival - A First Impression
item.description:
I received another Beogram 4002 (5513) turntable that needs some care. After unboxing it, I was pleased to see the effective packing method, similar to what I demonstrate in my 4002 shipping video. The sturdy metal construction of the 4002 makes it relatively easy to ship safely with proper double boxing and precautions. My initial assessment is positive. The aluminum surfaces are in great shape and will gleam with a thorough cleaning...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5513-another-new-arrival-a-first-impression/
